title: Authors and Citation
text: Lemus S, Stam H (2022). arthistory: Art History Textbook Data. https://github.com/saralemus7/arthistory, https://saralemus7.github.io/arthistory/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {arthistory: Art History Textbook Data},   author = {Sara Lemus and Holland Stam},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/saralemus7/arthistory, https://saralemus7.github.io/arthistory/}, }

title: Art History Textbook Data
text: package contains data used Holland Stam’s thesis work, titled Quantifying art historical narratives. data collected assess demographic representation artists editions Janson’s History Art Gardner’s Art Ages, two popular art history textbooks used American education system. package specifically, artist-level work-level data collected along variables regarding artists’ demographics numeric metrics describing much space work took edition textbook.

title: Art History Textbook Data
text: can install development version arthistory GitHub :

title: Art History Textbook Data
text: package contains three datasets: worksjanson: Contains individual work-level data edition Gardner’s art history textbook 1963 2011. work, information size work text displayed textbook well details work’s medium year created. Demographic data artist also included. worksgardner: Contains individual work-level data edition Gardner’s art history textbook 1926 2020. work, information size work displayed textbook well size accompanying descriptive text. Demographic data artist also included. artists: Contains various information artists edition Gardner Janson’s art history textbook 1926 2020. Data includes demographic information, space occupied textbook, well presence MoMA Whitney museums.

title: Northern Ireland baby names — artists
text: Full baby name data 1997 2020 Northern Ireland Northern Ireland Statistics Research Agency.

title: Northern Ireland baby names — artists
text: data frame 22,596 observations 6 variables. year year (1997-2020). sex Sex, M male F female. name name. n Count name within year sex. rank Rank name within year sex. nation Nation data source: Northern Ireland.

title: Northern Ireland baby names — worksgardner
text: data frame 2,325 observations 24 variables. artist_name name given artist given edition Gardner's Art Ages created two-dimensional work c. 1750. edition_number number edition Gardner's Art Ages. title_of_work title work listed .Gardner's Art Ages year year publication. page_number_of_image page number figure image text. artist_unique_id unique number assigned artist included Gardner's Art Ages created two-dimensional work c. 1750. artist_nationality nationaliity artist. artist_gender gender artist. artist_race race artist. artist_ethnicity ethnicity artist. height_of_work_in_book height centimeters figure work book . width_of_work_in_book width centimeters figure work book . height_of_text height centimeters text written given work given artist given edition. width_of_text width centimeters text written given work given artist given edition. extra_text_height height centimeters extra text written text work artist rectangular shape. extra_text_width width centimeters extra text written text work artist rectangular shape. area_of_work_in_book area centimeters squared work text. area_of_text area centimeters squared written work text. extra_text_area extra area centimeters squared written work rectangular text. total_area_text total area centimeters squared written given work. total_space area work centimeters squared plus area text centimeters squared given particular work. space_ratio_per_page total space centimeters squared divided area page given edition. book name book,Gardner's Art Ages, gardner short.
